page.title: 03LIFE STYLES
page.content: {LIFE-STYLE.}Life in 1985 is very comfortable.Tight jeans and "T"shirts are fashionable. People think they are comfortable.Girls like high-heeled shoes.Pop music and discos are very popular.Frankie goes to Hollywood is the best group at the moment.Celebrity pop groups are popular because of their charity discs to help starving people in Africa.Some people have their hair all cut off, called a mohican cut.When people stay in Coggeshall they can only stay at the White Hart Hotel.It is in the 1985 Good Food Guide made by Egon Ronay.The most popular pubs in Coggeshall are the Cricketers Yorkshire Grey and the Portobello. All pubs serve food and drink. Lots of people go on holiday by car to Europe, a popular area.A few go further afield to America or Africa.
